title: Base Waymark Node
description: The base structure for any recognized Waymark pattern element.

id.description: A unique identifier for this specific waymark instance.

kind.description: The discriminant kind of the waymark pattern (e.g., 'marker', 'tag').

location.description: The source file and line location of the waymark.

raw.description: The raw text content of the waymark node itself (e.g., '#backend', '!!todo').

comment.description: The full text of the comment line containing the waymark.
